page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: The main leisure place in the {Meadows}is the{Portland Leisure {Centre.}There are lots of sports to do there like karate, judo, hockey and roller-hockey. The schools in the Meadows use the pool for their swimming lessons. People sometimes play snooker and pool there. Also there are facilities to play exciting games like table-tennis, squash, badminton, football, volleyball and do weight training. The other indoor leisure place is the{Queen's Drive Community Centre. There are opportunities to do karate, sewing and other activities. There is also a gymnasium. The{Victoria Embankment Playing {Fields}is the main outdoor leisure site. People can use the area to jog, play cricket and football and relax in the paddling pool.
